body_html:
@longchr123 : Can you used tf.saved_model to save the graph and tf_convert https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel

to convert it. It is available with latest version of Tensorflow
